hints.content:
![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/1ac979819209d86966a21c44de5b4ba6.png)

$\qquad \begin{align}&\green{?} \text{ spaceships at first}\\
+& \underline{\blue{6} \text{ more spaceships }}\\
=&\pink{12} \text{ spaceships in total}\end{align}$

question.content:
Kira saw some spaceships in the sky. Then, she saw $6$ more. In total, she saw $12$ spaceships.

 **How many spaceships did Kira see first? **

[[☃ input-number 1]] spaceships
